benchmark_details.name: mASNQ (Multilingual Answer Sentence Selection)
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce new high-quality datasets for Answer Sentence Selection (AS2) in five European languages (French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish), obtained through supervised Automatic Machine Translation (AMT) of existing English AS2 datasets.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide high-quality multilingual AS2 datasets to close the performance gap between English and other languages.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: This paper focuses on five European languages, limiting the applicability of findings to other languages.

data.source: Translated datasets from existing English AS2 datasets (ASNQ, WikiQA, and TREC-QA).

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated as per standard information retrieval evaluation practices.
methodology.interpretation: Higher MAP and P@1 scores indicate better model performance.
methodology.validation: Evaluated performance across multiple multilingual models.
